content: Iván Mauricio Montilla Figueroa is an MSc. in Digital Investigation and Forensic Computing candidate at University College Dublin. He is keen interested in Cloud Forensics, E-Discovery and Technology Assisted Review.
summary: Iván Mauricio Montilla Figueroa is an MSc. in Digital Investigation and Forensic Computing candidate at University College Dublin. He is keen interested in Cloud Forensics, E-Discovery and Technology Assisted Review.
title: Iván Mauricio Montilla Figueroa

content: Use a compute service to execute code on demand (no servers). Write single-purpose stateless functions. Design push-based, event-driven pipelines. Create thicker, more powerful front ends. Embrace third-party services.
summary: How an ideal serverless system should be built.
title: Serverless architecture principles

content: Serverless is about running code in a compute service and interacting with services and APIs to get the job done.
title: Serverless
